properties.areaDesc: Waters from Lower Atchafalaya River to Intracoastal City LA from 20 to 60 NM; Vermilion Bay; Coastal waters from Lower Atchafalaya River to Intracoastal City LA out 20 NM
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued February 20 at 4:39AM CST until February 21 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Lake Charles LA
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Gale Warning, north winds 20 to 30 kt with gusts
up to 40 kt and seas 4 to 8 feet expected. For the Small Craft
Advisory, north winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to 35 kt and
seas 4 to 6 feet expected.

* WHERE...Vermilion Bay, Coastal waters from Lower Atchafalaya
River to Intracoastal City LA out 20 NM and Waters from Lower
Atchafalaya River to Intracoastal City LA from 20 to 60 NM.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, from 6 PM this evening to 6 AM
CST Friday. For the Small Craft Advisory, from noon today to 6
PM CST this evening.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... ...GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 AM CST FRIDAY
